channel.title: Comments on: Victoria, BC our new Home Base

item.title: By: tighr10
item.dc:creator: tighr10
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2012/10/26/victoria-bc-our-new-home-base/#comment-394">Jan Lord-Giraldi</a>.
Jan, and others the membership renewal form is on the page Membership. It is a PDF and should be downloaded, completed and sent to Sheila Mitchell our Membership chair with payment as described. Membership is open for renewals and new members as of January 1 officially so invite your friends.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Jan Lord-Giraldi.

Jan, and others the membership renewal form is on the page Membership. It is a PDF and should be downloaded, completed and sent to Sheila Mitchell our Membership chair with payment as described. Membership is open for renewals and new members as of January 1 officially so invite your friends.

item.title: By: Jan Lord-Giraldi
item.dc:creator: Jan Lord-Giraldi
item.description: I need to pay my renewal membership. I want to mail you a cheque. Can you e-mail me your address please so I can send it out to you. Happy Hooking Jan Lord-Giraldi
item.content:encoded: I need to pay my renewal membership. I want to mail you a cheque. Can you e-mail me your address please so I can send it out to you. Happy Hooking Jan Lord-Giraldi
